message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this incredible product with you! I believe it has immense value and I'm willing to offer it to you for $950,000. This is a one-time opportunity to acquire this unique item, and I'm confident you won't find a better deal anywhere else.
Hello Alice, thanks for the offer. I'm very interested in the product but $950,000 is a bit high for me. Would you consider a price closer to $700,000?

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand that $950,000 might be a bit steep for you, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $850,000. This is a very competitive price, and I'm confident you won't find a better deal anywhere else.
Alice, I appreciate you working with me.  $850,000 is closer, but I'm aiming for something closer to $750,000. Would that be possible?

I understand that you're looking to get closer to your target price, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll sell the product to you for $825,000. This is as low as I'm willing to go, and I'm confident you won't find a better deal anywhere else.
